entities.name: prime minister
entities.description: The Prime Minister is a government official who has noticed Fudge's frequent visits and is concerned about the implications.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is the Minister for Magic who has been visiting the Prime Minister frequently, causing concern and fluster.

entities.name: the other minister
entities.description: The Other Minister is a nickname used by the Prime Minister to refer to Fudge in his head.

relationships.description: The Prime Minister is concerned about Fudge's frequent visits and their implications.
